title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, what does the error message mean?
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, I should see the class hierarchies of the internal jars instead of the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant) and hit F4 to view the scoped type hierarchy. The error message should appear instead of the expected class hierarchies of the internal jars.
